meanings.definition: A highway or major road for fast-moving traffic, especially in France.
meanings.sent1: The autoroutes in France are known for their smooth roads and efficient traffic flow.
meanings.sent2: We took the autoroutes to reach our destination quickly.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the autoroutes? To get to the other side faster!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of autoroutes, always moving at high speed.
meanings.sent5: The autoroutes stretched out before us like ribbons of asphalt under the sun.

meanings.definition: To travel on or along autoroutes.
meanings.sent1: We autoroute through the countryside to avoid city traffic.
meanings.sent2: They autoroute to different cities for their business meetings.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to autoroute for a scenic road trip adventure.
meanings.sent4: She autoroutes with precision, never missing an exit or turn.
meanings.sent5: Autorouting along the coast, they enjoyed the breathtaking views of the ocean.
